tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited doctor Ashish Chopra for a fracture in my wrist. After examining the X-ray report and as per his advice, the fibre cast was put on my hand *** ** *** * ****** **** *** ***** I was facing so much inconvenience that I had to take a 2nd opinion and the senior doctor advised to change the cast because the current cast wasn‚Äôt protecting my thumb which meant I have to pay again for the treatment.
reply_text:
The patient was advised to re- visit for the problem which she didn't do. 

Kindly don't conclude without following the advice. 

If she would have followed up which was advised repeatedly no charges would have occurred for re-visit  or even applying the plaster again.

review: I have video consulted Dr.Ashish for my grandmother regarding pain management with her current medications. I explained the current medications and asked for suggestions, questions and clarifications. Doctor is not patient enough to answer and also impolite by saying that our questions are sensel.ss. We ask questions and consult you for answers. ** ** **** ********** *** ** ***** ******* * ******* ****** ** ****** *** *** ***** ********* I dont recommend him in the current state.
reply_text: For an instant video consultation randomly allotted everything was explained to the patient in detail. Patient's attendant Mr  Shashank was asking about REGULAR STEROID INTAKE BY PATIENT WHICH WAS NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL . Despite explaining everything & giving the best treatment neither any investigations have been done nor any update about condition of patient has been given.

review: In a world where time is scarce and in my experience in the recent times, Doctors have been known to just write off all issues with just medicines, Dr. Chopra was an Angel in disguise! Although a virtual consult owing to my knee injury, Dr Chopra not only gave me a patient hearing, but also answered all my queries, prescribed the at home care and medicines process very nicely. I experienced immediate relief with the meds prescribed and this has only strengthened my belief in his expertise. With a multitude of joint related concerns I look forward to consulting him in person when I'm back on my feet. I recommend him highly for anyone looking for the correct Diagnosis and best treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for your support and feedback ..  üôè
